data.name: Transporter Manager Tycoon - Mods on the road
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1513580/Transporter_Manager_Tycoon/?snr=1_5_1100__1100
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401750/Mission_Z/?snr=1_5_1100__1100
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561480/Duty_in_Forest/?snr=1_5_1100__1100


JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game



In Transporter Manager Tycoon - Mods on the road you'll have access to several new options to better customize your game, such as:

- Customize your money by adding or removing an amount
- Customize all available shipping
- Customize all available contracts
- Customize names and acronyms of other companies
- Customize employee characteristics
- Customize difficulty and company name after starting the game
- Customize your vehicles, increasing fuel and status beyond the imposed limit

With this expansion you will have a lot of freedom to do what you want with the game and, consequently, play the best way that suits you.

Modify, make it difficult or make it easier. Play it your way!
